quotes.quote: There's nothing wrong with helping someone without a cost. Especially if there's no end return.
If selfishness is the key to being miserable, then selflessness must be the key to being happy!
Real living is living for others.
Our compassion and acts of selflessness take us to the deeper truths.
Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
I've learned that selflessness is a practice, not a place; a journey much more than a destination.
For your kindness, I'm in debt to you. For your selflessness, my admiration.
If the entire world sought to make itself worthy of happiness rather than make itself happy, then the entire world would be happy.
Do some selfless service for people who are in need. Consider the whole picture, not just our little selves.
Behold I do not give lectures or a little charity, When I give I give myself.
Blessed is he who expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed.
Only those who have learned the power of sincere and selfless contribution experience life's deepest joy: true fulfillment.
Life is an exciting business, and most exciting when it is lived for others.
The men in the steel industry who sacrificed their all were nor merely aiding their fellows at home but were adding strength to the cause of their comrades in all industry.
Courage is inseparable from love and leads to what may arguably be the noblest of all warrior virtues: selflessness.
The mythic journey is always about selflessness.
Selflessness. Humility. Truthfulness. These are the three marks of an honorable man.
Nothing was really so important to my father as the achievement of selflessness. He rarely mentioned it directly, but tried to guide us to it in a roundabout way.
The mark of the immature man is that he wants to die nobly for a cause, while the mark of the mature man is that is wants to live humbly for one.
The greatest surprise of human evolution may be that the highest form of selfishness is selflessness.
Your determination, selflessness and courage have brought the freedom struggle towards its fulfillment.
True love is selfless. It is prepared to sacrifice.
Man can never be a woman's equal in the spirit of selfless service with which nature has endowed her.
Hopefully as you get older you get more selfless. That would be probably a good goal. I don't know if we do, though.
When you've married someone who's been at war, there is nothing you can do that compares to that level of selflessness and bravery.
You've got to be dedicated and throw yourself into parts and auditions in a way that is completely selfless.
Without selfless service, no one ever receives the fruits of their rewards.
Sometimes you have to be selfish to be selfless.
When selflessness is seen in objects, the seed of cyclic existence is destroyed.
There is power in self-sacrifice.
